description: Core infrastructure (MQ, S3, etc.) requires the VPC and subnets to be provisioned first.
mitigation_plan: Develop all Terraform scripts in parallel and use `terraform plan` to validate dependencies before applying.
impact_if_delayed: Entire infrastructure setup will be delayed.

description: The Odoo views for the vehicle model cannot be created until the model itself is defined.
mitigation_plan: Backend and Frontend developers to sync on the model definition before view creation begins.
impact_if_delayed: UI for vehicle management will be blocked.

description: Development of the GSP API client cannot begin until the API documentation has been analyzed and a data map is created.
mitigation_plan: The analysis task is the mitigation. Start this task at the very beginning of the sprint.
impact_if_delayed: The entire e-invoicing feature, a critical deliverable, will be delayed.
